attributes.action: Stop people from reselling concert tickets at a higher price
attributes.additional_details: By stopping people reselling at a higher price you allow more chance for fans and children who like to go to these things a better chance of going. Allowing them to enjoy things in life at an affordable price as some people can’t spent the extra money needed at resale.
attributes.background: Why are we letting people resell tickets to gain money. This shouldn’t be allowed tickets should only allowed to be resold at the cost of what they were bought for no company’s should allow resale at a higher price.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: "Ban all ticket touting and reselling of tickets for higher prices" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734049
